amendment.description: Amendment increases debate time for H.R. 9 under the rule from one hour to 70 minutes and increases debate time for the Levin of Michigan substitute amendment from 20 to 25 minutes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make changes to the debate time for both the resolution and the amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
